00008 
00009 #include "TTDegrade.h"
00010 
00011 #define BIG_INT 0x00800000
00012 #define ONE_OVER_BIG_INT 1.1920928955E-7
00013 
00014 
00015 TTDegrade::TTDegrade(TTUInt8 newMaxNumChannels)
00016         : TTAudioObject::TTAudioObject(newMaxNumChannels),
00017         accumulator(NULL), output(NULL)
00018 {
00019         // register parameters
00020         registerParameter(TT("bitdepth"),       kTypeInt32,             &attrBitdepth,  (TTSetterMethod)&TTDegrade::setBitdepth);
00021         registerParameter(TT("srRatio"),        kTypeFloat32,   &attrSrRatio);
00022 
00023         // register for notifications from the parent class so we can allocate memory as required
00024         registerMessage(TT("updateMaxNumChannels"), (TTMethod)&TTDegrade::updateMaxNumChannels);
00025 
00026         // Set Defaults...
00027         setParameterValue(TT("maxNumChannels"), newMaxNumChannels);
00028         setParameterValue(TT("bitdepth"),               24);
00029         setParameterValue(TT("srRatio"),                1.0);
00030         setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTDegrade::processAudio);
00031 }
00032 
00033 
00034 TTDegrade::~TTDegrade()
00035 {
00036         free(accumulator);
00037         free(output);
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 TTErr TTDegrade::updateMaxNumChannels()
00042 {
00043         short i;
00044         
00045         if(accumulator)
00046                 free(accumulator);
00047         if(output)
00048                 free(output);
00049         
00050         accumulator = (TTSampleValue*)malloc(sizeof(TTSampleValue) * maxNumChannels);
00051         output = (TTSampleValue*)malloc(sizeof(TTSampleValue) * maxNumChannels);
00052         for(i=0; i<maxNumChannels; i++){
00053                 accumulator[i] = 0.0;
00054                 output[i] = 0.0;                                // clear the values
00055         }
00056         return kTTErrNone;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 TTErr TTDegrade::setBitdepth(const TTValue& newValue)
00061 {
00062         attrBitdepth = clip((int)newValue, 1, 24);
00063         bitShift = 24 - attrBitdepth;
00064         return kTTErrNone;
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 TTErr TTDegrade::processAudio(TTAudioSignal& in, TTAudioSignal& out)
00069 {
00070         short                   vs;
00071         TTSampleValue   *inSample,
00072                                         *outSample;
00073         short                   numchannels = TTAudioSignal::getMinChannelCount(in, out);
00074         short                   channel;
00075         long                    l;
00076 
00077         for(channel=0; channel<numchannels; channel++){
00078                 inSample = in.sampleVectors[channel];
00079                 outSample = out.sampleVectors[channel];
00080                 vs = in.vs;
00081                 
00082                 while(vs--){
00083                         // SampeRate Reduction
00084                         accumulator[channel] += attrSrRatio;
00085                         if(accumulator[channel] >= 1.0){
00086                                 output[channel] = *inSample++;
00087                                 accumulator[channel] -= 1.0;
00088                         }
00089                 
00090                         // BitDepth Reduction
00091                         l = (long)(output[channel] * BIG_INT);                  // change float to long int
00092                         l >>= bitShift;                                                                 // shift away the least-significant bits
00093                         l <<= bitShift;                                                                 // shift back to the correct registers
00094                         *outSample++ = (float) l * ONE_OVER_BIG_INT;    // back to float
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         return kTTErrNone;
00098 }
